name: MG Barrelz
description:
MG Barrelz

In this game you must shoot the "barrelz" and hidden "plant pots".

 I wanted to keep this project quite simple since this has been a learning project for me. 

I am still considering wether to turn this project in an actual game with better assets and stages, or to completely move on.

Known issues: 

-Collision between the barrelz and the player can be interesting.

-High scores dont work

-Game does not reset stats, quit and restart the game manually to fix this.

-Esc button does not close in game menu
